Operation_Description: Prepare Wood Components - Cut and shape wooden parts
Assemble Chair Frame - Attach legs, seat base, and backrest
Sand and Finish Components - Smooth and apply finish
Packaging - Box and prepare for shipment
Prepare Metal Components - Cut and shape metal parts
Assemble Metal Frame - Attach metal legs, seat base, and backrest
Apply Protective Coating - Coat with anti-corrosion layer
Packaging - Box and prepare for shipment
